properties.description: This workflow monitors a mailbox for incoming email with suspicious URL detected by Cisco Secure Email. When an email is received, the workflow look for the suspicious URL and send it to Cisco Secure Malware Analytics. A SecureX casebook is created.

actions.name: For Each
actions.title: Read from each email in attachment from the event

properties.display_name: Read from each email in attachment from the event
